QuestData.Title: Boulder Delivery
QuestData.Description: Here you go, as promised! One Boulder-in-a-Box.$B$BLilith was asking for this, wasn't she? She's my only customer!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Boulder-in-a-Box to Lilith the Lithe in Everlook.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, it's you again. Where's that boulder?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you actually brought the boulder! I'm a bit surprised.$B$BStand back and witness the pinnacle of craftsmanship.
